title: Policies and Profiles Guide
subtitle: Policy-based enforcement, compliance, events, and policy profiles for Red Hat CloudForms

abstract.para: This guide provides instructions for policy-based actions in a Red Hat CloudForms environment, including system controls, enforcement, compliance, and events. Information and procedures in this book are relevant to Red Hat CloudForms administrators.

If you have a suggestion for improving this guide or have found an error, please submit a Bugzilla report at http://bugzilla.redhat.com against Red Hat CloudForms Management Engine for the Documentation component. Please provide specific details, such as the section number, guide name, and CloudForms version so we can easily locate the content.
